Package org.cesecore.audit.log

Interface SecurityEventsLoggerSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SecurityEventsLoggerSessionLocal, SecurityEventsLoggerSessionRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityEventsLoggerSessionBean
    public interface SecurityEventsLoggerSession
    This interface provides access to storing security audit log entries.
    Version:
    $Id: SecurityEventsLoggerSession.java 167 2011-01-27 09:11:21Z tomas$

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void log​(AuthenticationToken authToken, EventType eventType, EventStatus eventStatus, ModuleType module, ServiceType service)
      Creates a signed log, stored in the database.
      void log​(AuthenticationToken authToken, EventType eventType, EventStatus eventStatus, ModuleType module, ServiceType service, String customId, String searchDetail1, String searchDetail2, Map<String,​Object> additionalDetails)
      Creates a signed log, stored in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • log

        void log​(AuthenticationToken authToken,
         EventType eventType,
         EventStatus eventStatus,
         ModuleType module,
         ServiceType service)
  throws AuditRecordStorageException,
         AuthorizationDeniedException
        Creates a signed log, stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        authToken - The authentication token of the entity that invoked the operation.
        eventType - The event log type.
        eventStatus - The status of the operation to log.
        module - The module where the operation took place.
        service - The service (application) that performed the operation.
        Throws:
        AuditRecordStorageException - On fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access denied

      • log

        void log​(AuthenticationToken authToken,
         EventType eventType,
         EventStatus eventStatus,
         ModuleType module,
         ServiceType service,
         String customId,
         String searchDetail1,
         String searchDetail2,
         Map<String,​Object> additionalDetails)
  throws AuditRecordStorageException,
         AuthorizationDeniedException
        Creates a signed log, stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        authToken - The authentication token of the entity that invoked the operation.
        eventType - The event log type.
        eventStatus - The status of the operation to log.
        module - The module where the operation took place.
        service - The service (application) that performed the operation.
        customId - A custom identifier related to this event (e.g. a CA's identifier)
        searchDetail1 - A detail of this event that can be queried for using QueryCriteria (database) searches (e.g. a certificate serialnumber)
        searchDetail2 - A detail of this event that can be queried for using QueryCriteria (database) searches (e.g. a username)
        additionalDetails - Additional details of this event to be stored in a non-searchable manner.
        Throws:
        AuditRecordStorageException - On fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access denied
